Title: *BRAND NEW* Movado Women's Red Label Black  Leather Automatic  Watch 0607010
Description: Product Features: Distinguished by red lettering on the black Museum dial that has a yellow-gold-tone dot and hands this Red Label women's watch from Movado epitomizes sophistication. The automatic movement is visible through an exhibition case back, and is set in a 26mm yellow-gold-tone PVD-finish stainless steel case topped with a scratch-resistant sapphire crystal. A yellow-gold-tone PVD-finish stainless steel buckle secures the black alligator leather strap, and the women's watch is water-resistant to 30 meters. THIS BRAND NEW Movado WATCH COMES WITH THE Movado FACTORY WARRANTY AND THE ORIGINAL Movado WATCH BOX. "WE ARE AN AUTHORIZED MOVADO DEALER.
